entry.title: https://github.com/nf-core/bacass
entry.content: Simple bacterial assembly and annotation pipeline

entry.title: https://github.com/nf-core/bactmap
entry.content: A mapping-based pipeline for creating a phylogeny from bacterial whole genome sequences

entry.title: https://github.com/nf-core/clipseq
entry.content: CLIP sequencing analysis pipeline for QC, pre-mapping, genome mapping, UMI deduplication, and multiple peak-calling options.

entry.title: https://github.com/nf-core/configs
entry.content: Config files used to define parameters specific to compute environments at different Institutions

entry.title: https://github.com/nf-core/isoseq
entry.content: Genome annotation with PacBio Iso-Seq. Takes raw subreads as input, generate Full Length Non Chemiric (FLNC) sequences and produce a bed annotation.

entry.title: https://github.com/nf-core/modules
entry.content: Repository to host tool-specific module files for the Nextflow DSL2 community!

entry.title: https://github.com/nf-core/pathogensurveillance
entry.content: Surveillance of pathogens using population genomics and sequencing

entry.title: https://github.com/nf-core/rnaseq
entry.content: RNA sequencing analysis pipeline using STAR, RSEM, HISAT2 or Salmon with gene/isoform counts and extensive quality control.

entry.title: https://github.com/nf-core/sarek
entry.content: Analysis pipeline to detect germline or somatic variants (pre-processing, variant calling and annotation) from WGS / targeted sequencing

entry.title: https://github.com/nf-core/taxprofiler
entry.content: Highly parallelised multi-taxonomic profiling of shotgun short- and long-read metagenomic data

entry.title: https://github.com/nf-core/viralrecon
entry.content: Assembly and intrahost/low-frequency variant calling for viral samples
